title: Nightmares
alt: Well, *I* think I'm real. Look at me. Look at my face. Cut me and I'll bleed. What more do you want? Please don't go.
transcript:
[Caption above the panel:]
When I got used to the regular nightmares, my subconscious got creative.[Megan is standing with her hand on Cueball's shoulder.]
Megan: Please don't wake up. I don't want to die.
